mapper.select: select id, bus_business_id, patrol_scene_type, item_name, parent_id, root_depth, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time from kf_patrol_item_info where id = #{id}

select id, bus_business_id, patrol_scene_type, item_name, parent_id, root_depth, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time from kf_patrol_item_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into kf_patrol_item_info(bus_business_id, patrol_scene_type, item_name, parent_id, root_depth, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time) values (#{busBusinessId}, #{patrolSceneType}, #{itemName}, #{parentId}, #{rootDepth}, #{deleteFlag}, #{createTime}, #{createUserUuid}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyUserUuid}, #{updateTime}); INSERT INTO kf_patrol_item_path (ancestor, descendant, depth) SELECT n.ancestor, last_insert_id(), n.depth + 1 FROM kf_patrol_item_path n WHERE n.descendant = #{parentId} UNION ALL SELECT last_insert_id(), last_insert_id(), 0;

insert into kf_patrol_item_info(bus_business_id, patrol_scene_type, item_name, parent_id, root_depth, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time) values
(#{entity.busBusinessId}, #{entity.patrolSceneType}, #{entity.itemName}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.rootDepth}, #{entity.deleteFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUserUuid}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.modifyUserUuid}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into kf_patrol_item_info(bus_business_id, patrol_scene_type, item_name, parent_id, root_depth, delete_flag, create_time, create_user_uuid, modify_time, modify_user_uuid, update_time) values
(#{entity.busBusinessId}, #{entity.patrolSceneType}, #{entity.itemName}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.rootDepth}, #{entity.deleteFlag}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createUserUuid}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.modifyUserUuid}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update bus_business_id = values(bus_business_id) , patrol_scene_type = values(patrol_scene_type) , item_name = values(item_name) , parent_id = values(parent_id) , root_depth = values(root_depth) , delete_flag = values(delete_flag) , create_time = values(create_time) , create_user_uuid = values(create_user_uuid) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , modify_user_uuid = values(modify_user_uuid) , update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update kf_patrol_item_info
bus_business_id = #{busBusinessId},
patrol_scene_type = #{patrolSceneType},
item_name = #{itemName},
parent_id = #{parentId},
root_depth = #{rootDepth},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user_uuid = #{createUserUuid},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
modify_user_uuid = #{modifyUserUuid},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
